name: More Chapter one
description:
The First More game Now On itch.io! Play now for the lore, fun, and what else this crap has to offer! Quick, play and test it out free NOW. I should stop advertising.

(For theorists, the story takes place after the first 3 fnaf games and is a darker story, I think.)

More on gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/MORE-ch1/729277
